item.title: James Lovell, the steady astronaut who brought Apollo 13 home safely, has died
item.description: Lovell was the first person to fly to the Moon twice.

item.title: Tom Hanks Honors Astronaut Jim Lovell, Who He Portrayed in ‘Apollo 13’: ‘God Speed You, on This Next Voyage’
item.description: Tom Hanks has shared a tribute to James A. Lovell, the astronaut he portrayed in the 1995 feature “Apollo 13.” Lovell died Thursday at the age of 97. The film, directed by Ron Howard, star
